article_title: Recap: IDF says it mistakenly killed three men held in Gaza.
sentence: Recap:  IDF  says  it  mistakenly  killed  three  men  held  in  Gaza.

article_title: Recap: IDF says it mistakenly killed three men held in Gaza.
sentence: We've  just  had  some  breaking  news  from  the  Israel  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  who  say  the  three  hostages  mistakenly  killed  by  the  Israeli  military  yesterday  were  holding  a  white  cloth  on  a  stick.

article_title: Recap: IDF says it mistakenly killed three men held in Gaza.
sentence: The  military  shared  its  remorse  and  said  the  three  were  shot  by  troops  operating  in  Shejaiya,  in  Gaza's  north.
